name: One Night at Bendy's demo the game.
name_original: One Night at Bendy's demo the game.
description:
Story: so, After a cartoon of Bendy and his friends came on, you heard that a new building is open. you don't know what it is, but, a day after, you walk down the streets and you found the building that said HELP WANTED. you decided to join. but, if only you knew what was going to happen...

                                                                 NOTHINg ELSe. more characters in the full ver.

Bendy:movement: starts in cam 1, then goes to cam 2 dining room, and cam 4 left hall, and your office.Boris:Movement: starts in cam 1, then goes to cam 2 dining room, and cam 3 kitchen, and cam 5, right hall, and your office.

characters are bendy, boris.
